channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft Surprises Windows Users After Update To Stop Chrome Downloads
item.description: No one expected this awkward mistake from Microsoft at the beginning of 2026.

item.title: Evotrex Unveils Off-The-Grid RV At 2026 CES
item.description: California tech company Evotrex unveiled what it calls the world's first power-generating RV at 2026 CES on Tuesday.

item.title: Maduro's removal could reverse decades of economic struggles for Venezuelans
item.description: The arrest of Nicolás Maduro in a U.S. raid could bring relief to average Venezuelans after decades of economic mismanagement led to rampant inflation...

item.title: President Trump stands ready to send U.S. Big Oil into Venezuela en masse, but the messy reality of rebuilding a ruined industry takes many years
item.description: Doubling Venezuela's weakened oil flows could cost $110 billion and take until 2030.

item.title: Cambridge Audio Announces The New L/R Series Of Powered Speakers Designed For Streaming
item.description: The new Cambridge L/R Series of active speakers consist of three models: L/R X, L/R M and L/R S. Each stereo speaker pair has been designed to reveal ...

item.title: Trump’s strike on Venezuela gives the U.S. 30% of the world’s oil reserves on paper and a $100 billion rebuilding job in reality
item.description: “I don't think any large U.S. major company is going to want to invest without a series of guarantees,” one historian of Venezuela said.

item.title: Fully Charged In Sicily: Around Europe’s Largest Island By EV
item.description: If you can make it here, you can make it anywhere. That was the idea of trying to go round Europe’s largest island Sicily in a fully electric car.

item.title: Ugreen Unveils Its New AI NAS, Smart Security Products And 300W Charger At CES 2026
item.description: Ugreen has announced a slew of new products at CES 2026, including intelligent AI NAS storage, a proactive home security and an advanced 300W charging...

item.description: Scott Bessent called it “a historic victory in preserving U.S. sovereignty and protecting American workers and businesses from extraterritorial overre...

item.title: Maduro’s capture puts Cuba’s Venezuelan oil-dependent economy at risk
item.description: The U.S. military captures Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro, threatening Cuba's economy as the nation loses a key provider of oil supplies for communi...

item.title: Oil experts predict slight rise in gas prices as global tensions mount
item.description: Oil and gasoline prices could rise slightly due to Venezuelan export losses and geopolitical uncertainty, though pump prices remain at COVID-19 lows.

item.title: Energy stocks rip as JP Morgan estimates the U.S. could hold 30% of all the world’s oil
item.description: U.S. control of the Venezuelan energy industry could “reshape the balance of power in international energy markets,” analysts with JP Morgan wrote Mon...

item.title: Trump tells NBC U.S. may reimburse firms for Venezuela oil efforts
item.description: Energy experts say reviving Venezuela’s oil industry could be a decade-long process, and could cost upwards of $100 billion.

item.title: Venezuela's billions in distressed debt: Who is in line to collect?
item.description: Venezuela defaulted in 2017 on government and PDVSA bonds, with accumulated interest swelling total liabilities far beyond original amounts.

item.title: At CES, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang delivers 6 words investors will appreciate

item.description: Bill Ackman slams California's proposed billionaire wealth tax as "expropriation of private property" as tech moguls reportedly consider leaving the s...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
